Name: Way Of Vulcan
About the game: Way Of Vulcan is a medieval fantasy game about mining and blacksmithing, where war rages between nations. Our character and his brother work for a blacksmith. when the war draws near to the kingdom, our brother is needed for the army and it is up to us to carry out his duties. Mining Collect required gems in multiple huge caves. Gather the additional materials The equipments you will make is not only with gems, but you also need special materials and there are different ways to collect these materials. Crafting Produce the materials needed for the equipments and have our master to make it. Quests Take quests from people and complete them all and for each completed quest you unlock the weapons you crafted in your museum. Museum You can see every equipment you made in here.
